msContents.summary: Tax register, recording day by day the collection of money taxes.

msItemStruct.note: Pub. status: Recto; this column contains two lines of writing at the top edge.
+ P.Cair. Inv. 57187; P.Iand. VII, 141; P.Mich. Inv. 2830; 3159; 4910

condition.ab: This light-brown papyrus is regularly cut at all sides except at the top where it has been torn off. Kollesis in the left column of writing. (TC).

handDesc.p: Written in a quick but clear cursive. The scribe separated a new entry from the preceding one by underlining the name of the tax payer. Diairesis used occasionally. (TC)

origin.origPlace: Karanis, Herakleidou meris, Arsinoite nome, province of Egypt

keywords.term: see electronic version of P.Mich. IV, 224

div.ab: " (Column) 16:;Horion, son of Petheus, grandson of Esouris, mother Kommonis, drachmas 8;;Ammonios, son of Ammonios, grandson of Ammonios, mother Tninis, drachmas 4;;Mysthes, son of Petheus, grandson of Mysthes, mother Tasoucharion, drachmas 4;;Horos the younger, son of Hatres, grandson of Horos, mother Teraus, drachmas 4;;Onnophris, son of Pnepheros, grandson of Phanomgeus, mother Thaesis, obols 28;;Horion, son of Kanis, grandson of Anchophis, mother Thermouthis, drachmas 4;;Petsiris, son of Pasion, grandson of Petsiris, mother Taonnophris, drachmas 8;;Petesouchos, son of Petheus, grandson of Petheus, mother Tkollainis, drachmas 8;;Anoubas, son of Horos, grandson of Anoubas, mother Tepheros, drachmas 4;;in total for the day drachmas 28, obols 28;;(Tybi) 25 likewise:;Petheus, son of Petheus, grandson of Petheus, mother Tauris, guard tax , drachmas 8;;Petesouchos, son of Petheus, grandson of Petaus, mother Thaesis, drachmas 8;;Anchophis, son of Anchophis, grandson of Petheus, mother Taorsenouphis, drachmas 8;;Petheus, son of Petheus, grandson of Onnophris, mother Taphaseis, drachmas 12;;Hatres, son of Apollonios, grandson of Heraklas, mother Taorsenouphis, drachmas 8, obols 28;;Petaus, son of Petheus, grandson of Petesouchos, mother Stiynchis, drachmas 16, obols 16;;12th year the same, ? copper drachmas of the priests;;Onnophris, son of Sisois, grandson of Petsiris, mother Thaesis, drachmas 4;;Maron, son of Satabous, grandson of Maron, mother Tkonnos, drachmas 4;;in total for the day drachmas 72, obols 27 of which 12th year obols 12;;Ptolemaios, son of Ptolemaios, grandson of Sokrates, mother Soeris, drachmas 20;;Artemas, brother with the same mother, drachmas 20;;Kames, son of Pasoxis, grandson of Polyndikes, mother Thaesis, drachmas 12;;Sarapion, son of Harpalos, grandson of Sarapion, mother Tapetheus, drachmas 8;;Pnepheros, son of Petaus, grandson of Pnepheros, mother Thaesis, drachmas 8;;Harpagathes, son of Satabous, grandson of Anchophis, mother Sambathion, drachmas 8;;Anchophis, son of Horos, grandson of Anchophis, mother Tapetheus, drachmas 4;;In total for the day drachmas 76;;(Tybi) likewise:;12th year Heron, son of Sabeinos, grandson of Pnepheros, mother Gaia, copper drachmas 4;;Patron, son of Sokmenis, grandson of Sokmenis, mother Taonnophris, drachmas 4;;Ammonios, son of Harpagathes, grandson of Heras, mother Segathis, drachmas 4, obols 28;;Heron, son of Ptolemaios, grandson of Pnepheros, mother Heras, drachmas 4;;Phanomgeus, son of Phanomgeus, grandson of Phanomgeus, mother Taptosiris, drachmas 4;;Ptolemaios, brother with the same mother, drachmas 4;;Pasion, son of Petheus, grandson of Sambathion, mother Tathautis, drachmas 12;;Maron, son of Maron, grandson of Petoraipis, mother Herois, drachmas 8, obols 28;;Sambas, son of Sokmenis, grandson of Sambas, mother Tkollainis, drachmas 4;;Ptolemaios, son of Esouris, grandson of Heras, mother Thaesis, drachmas 4;;Petaus, son of Esouris, grandson of Petheus, mother Tkollauthis, drachmas 4;;[in total for the day drachmas 60, obols] s (?)[7, of which 12th year drachmas 4].";(Verso): "Hadrianos 21 until Tybi 11."
